long_description: Give your baby serious-and fun-eye protection from harmful UV rays with RKS Explorer Sunglasses for infants. Lenses are impact-resistant, shatterproof polycarbonate that provide 100% UVA/UVB protection. Colorful wrap-around frame minimizes exposure to peripheral light. Flexible frame has a soft, adjustable strap that holds the sunglasses on comfortably; can be removed when your child grows older. RKS Explorer Sunglasses for infants, like all Real Kids Shades, are tested to contain no lead, BPA or phthalates.
short_description: Give your baby serious-and fun-eye protection from harmful UV rays with RKS Explorer Sunglasses for infants.
